data.speaker: Friend
data.content: That's kind of weird... so the top one is going to kill the one on his left? Then number 11 will kill number 10?

data.speaker: Friend
data.content: Then 9 kills 8, and so on, until only one is left?

data.speaker: Player
data.content: Who is setting up these messed up games anyways? Who is sick enough to come up with this twisted scenario?

data.speaker: Friend
data.content: So which is it? Where do you have to sit to ensure your survival?
